::Lord Jhiaxus::

After sometime, Jhiaxus was gaining on Windlord fast. By this point they should be able to hear each others thrusters.

Jhiaxus: Outdated junk, know that your better is coming to wipe your pathetic spark from existence! Are you ready to die at the hands of the next generation?! Fear your Lord Jhiaxus!

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Windlord:
 
 "SLag"cursed Windlord when an allarm alerted hin that an enemie was 
 behind him. He used his weapon's energy to his rockets and started to 
 flew as quick as he can towards the old maximal city witout leave Kup.
 
 In case that he needed it, still he would be able to defend himself 
 with some nasty "surprices"
 
 OOC: am I freely to use the old MAximal City, jsut for some posts?

 >

 sight. After a quick survey, Jhiaxus realizes that someone has 
 already been there. He is able to track Windlord and Kup and follows 
 a pursuit course.

 > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>
